relation: I haven't lived in the dorms here.
Tough but necessary but, they will help with anything.
Very good on pricing and very awesome teachers. Small class sizes and the teacher cares for your questions or concerns.

textAfterTable: Wow I can't tell you how much I learned at this school. To me it was hard work but I learned more than I ever did in all 4 yrs of high school in one semester Login to rate or flag the reviews Mathusalen from Lubbock, TX 01/31/2012 Reviewer is A current student here. 5 out of 5 people found this review useful. 2 of 40 Categories Comments Campus Safety the safety on campus is great. students do feel safe as they attend classes, and have places to go for help, if needed. Clubs and Activities intramurals, gay and straight alliance, and so many other varieties of clubs. Great for these types of students students that are older and coming back to school. students that have just graduated and are worried about the large college experience. actually all students.
